original: 漢獻帝因曹操專權，密發衣帶詔命董承剷除曹操，种輯、王子服、吳碩、劉備、等人亦參與其中。後風聲走漏，共謀者盡被誅殺，唯劉備因統兵在外，得以倖免。
text: Due to the monopoly of Cao Cao, Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty ordered Dong Cheng to eradicate Cao Cao, including Chong Ji, Wang Zifu, Wu Shuo, Liu Bei, and others. After the wind leaked, all the co-conspirators were killed, but Liu Bei was spared because he was out of command.
